Task: College consultant writing a statement of purpose

Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert college consultant. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to write a statement of purpose.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a statement of purpose based on the question and answer above. add some context and make it long.

QApair.Question: What are your academic interests?
QApair.Answer: I am interested in a variety of subjects, but I particularly enjoy control theory, linear algebra and machine vision.

QApair.Question: What experience have you had in these areas?
QApair.Answer: I have taken several courses in each of these areas and have done well in them. I have also had internships in companies that work with machine vision.

QApair.Question: What are your long-term goals?
QApair.Answer: I would like to continue my studies in robotics and eventually build intelligent robots that can help society.

QApair.Question: Why do you want to study at this university?
QApair.Answer: I believe that this university has a strong program in robotics and that I will be able to learn from some of the best minds in the field.

QApair.Question: What do you think you will contribute to the university?
QApair.Answer: I have done research in robotics and would like to continue doing research at this university which I consider a great contribution to the university.

QApair.Question: What are your hobbies and interests?
QApair.Answer: I like to read, listen to music and travel. I also like to play badminton.

QApair.Question: What are your strengths and weaknesses?
QApair.Answer: I am very analytical and I like to solve problems. However, I sometimes get too caught up in the details and I need to learn to take a step back.

QApair.Question: What are your plans for after graduation?
QApair.Answer: I plan to get some industrial experience in robotics or relate fields and try to achieve my long-term goal.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else you would like to add?
QApair.Answer: I am confident that I will be able to do well in this program and contribute to the university.

QApair.Question: What are your referees' names and contact details?
QApair.Answer: Dr. Chitta Baral  chitta.baral@asu.edu  480-727-6047

Instances.Output: My name is ________ and I am interested in studying robotics at the graduate level. I have been interested in robotics since I was a child, and I have been fortunate enough to have had some experience in the field through internships and courses. I believe that I can make a valuable contribution to the field of robotics, and I am eager to continue my studies at a renowned university like ________. I have always been interested in how things work and how they can be made to work better. This curiosity led me to study engineering, and I soon realized that robotics was the perfect field for me. I love the challenge of designing and building robots that can perform tasks that are difficult or even impossible for humans to do. I have taken several courses in robotics and related fields, and I have done internships in companies that work with machine vision. These experiences have given me a strong foundation on which to build my future studies. I am confident that I can do well in this program and contribute to the university.

QApair.Question: What are your academic interests?
QApair.Answer: I particularly enjoy to study language and culture.

QApair.Question: What experience have you had in these areas?
QApair.Answer: I have taken several courses in each of these areas and have done well in them. I have also had internships in companies that help different people to preserve their culture.

QApair.Question: What are your long-term goals?
QApair.Answer: I would like to continue my studies in cultural studies and eventually help people save their cultural heritage.

QApair.Question: Why do you want to study at this university?
QApair.Answer: I believe that this university has a strong program in cultural studies and that I will be able to learn from some of the best minds in the field.

QApair.Question: What do you think you will contribute to the university?
QApair.Answer: I have helped many people of different culture and would like to continue doing research at this university which I consider a great contribution to the university.

QApair.Question: What are your hobbies and interests?
QApair.Answer: I like to read, listen to music and travel. I also like to play badminton.

QApair.Question: What are your strengths and weaknesses?
QApair.Answer: I am very analytical and I like to solve problems. However, I sometimes get too caught up in the details and I need to learn to take a step back.

QApair.Question: What are your plans for after graduation?
QApair.Answer: I plan to travel around the world, meet new people, discover their cultural heritage and try to achieve my long-term goal.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else you would like to add?
QApair.Answer: I am confident that I will be able to do well in this program and contribute to the university.

QApair.Question: What are your referees' names and contact details?
QApair.Answer: Dr. Marianne Kim  marianne.kim@asu.edu  602-543-6079

Instances.Output: I am interested in studying language and culture because I believe that it is important to understand and appreciate the differences between people. I have taken several courses in these areas and have done well in them. I have also had internships in companies that help different people to preserve their culture. I would like to continue my studies in cultural studies and eventually help people save their cultural heritage. I am applying to study at this university because I believe that it has a strong program in cultural science and that I will be able to learn from some of the best minds in the field. I have helped many people of different culture and would like to continue doing research at this university which I consider a great contribution to the university. I am confident that I will be able to do well in this program and contribute to the university. I have strong analytical skills and I enjoy solving problems. However, I sometimes get too caught up in the details and I need to learn to take a step back. After graduation, I plan to travel around the world, meet new people, discover their cultural heritage and try to achieve my long-term goal.

QApair.Question: What are your academic interests?
QApair.Answer: I am interested in a variety of subjects, but I particularly enjoy business and management.

QApair.Question: What experience have you had in these areas?
QApair.Answer: I have taken several courses in each of these areas and have done well in them. I have also had internships in companies that uses business management.

QApair.Question: What are your long-term goals?
QApair.Answer: I would like to continue my studies in business management and eventually become entrepreneur.

QApair.Question: Why do you want to study at this university?
QApair.Answer: I believe that this university has a strong program in business management and that I will be able to learn from some of the best minds in the field.

QApair.Question: What do you think you will contribute to the university?
QApair.Answer: I have explored many techniques of business management and would like to continue doing research at this university which I consider a great contribution to the university.

QApair.Question: What are your hobbies and interests?
QApair.Answer: I like to read, listen to music and travel. I also like to play badminton.

QApair.Question: What are your strengths and weaknesses?
QApair.Answer: I am very analytical and I like to solve problems. However, I sometimes get too caught up in the details and I need to learn to take a step back.

QApair.Question: What are your plans for after graduation?
QApair.Answer: I plan to get some practical exposure to the techniques of business management and try to achieve my long-term goal.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else you would like to add?
QApair.Answer: I am confident that I will be able to do well in this program and contribute to the university.

QApair.Question: What are your referees' names and contact details?
QApair.Answer: Dr. Michael Baer  mikebaer@asu.edu  480-727-4290

Instances.Output: I am interested in studying business management at the university level because it is a subject that has always fascinated me. I have had some experience in the field through internships and coursework, and I have found that I have a natural aptitude for the subject. I believe that studying business management will allow me to develop the skills that I need to eventually become an entrepreneur. I am attracted to this university because of its excellent reputation in business management. I am confident that I will be able to learn from some of the best minds in the field and that I will be able to contribute to the university through my research. I am a hard-working and motivated individual who is always looking to improve. I am confident that I will be able to do well in this program and contribute to the university.
